ctx: Q10 Air netbook z vgrajenim 3G wireless (HSPDA 7.2
content:
Q10 Air z vgrajenim 3G wireless (HSPDA 7.2) modemom

Podoben kot acer aspire one, ali asus eee pc 900, 901, 700 ali 1000 in drugi netbooki


Q10air oz. ECS G10IL netbook z vgrajenim 3G wireless (HSPDA 7.2) modemom (vstavi se sim kartico).
Baterija drži odlično - od treh ur naprej!

CENA 250€ (zadnja cena!!!!)


CPU: Intel Atom N270 
Chipset: Intel 945 GSE, ICH7M
Operating System: Windows XP
Memory: 1 Gb - 1 slot SODIMM 200-pin DDR2 533/667, up to 2GB
Screen: LCD Size 10.2" 1024 x 600 pixels
Ports: 3xUSB 2.0, Card Reader (SD, SDHC, MMC, MS), VGA out
Webcam: 1.3 mega pixel CCD
Storage: 160 HDD
Battery: 6 cell
3G wireless (HSPDA 7.2) modem
Dimensions: 259 x 180 x 28.5 (mm)


Opis: http://blog.laptopmag.com/ecs-g10i...


Menjam samo za kakšen mobitel višjega ranga.


sepa080@gmail.com

cena 250€
